messages.subject: posting after two weeks
messages.msgSnippet: I do agree wholeheartedly that one should  read postings on this loop for about two weeks, or accomplish knowledge of the group by (argh! pop-ups) going
messages.messageBody:
I do agree wholeheartedly that one should read postings on this loop for
about two weeks, or accomplish knowledge of the group by (argh! pop-ups)
going through past postings. Why? so to be able to learn what's going on in
all the many threads and not repeat questions recently exhausted!

Having said that I (sheepishly) admit I've only been on one day....

Enjoying what I've read so far--jumping in later though!
~Diane


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
